ValidationRule.description: If Template Assignment Criteria i.e., Filter Criteria field is Empty then Placement Credit Template should not be in State Active.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISNULL(bpats__Filter_Criteria__c), ISBLANK(bpats__Filter_Criteria__c) ), bpats__Active__c = true )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: To Activate this Template please add a "Template Assignment Criteria"
